Introduction
This topic contains information on processing a request for waiver of a debt, including
description of the COWC
processing a debt waiver request originating at the RO
processing an award after VA grants a request for waiver of a debt
, and
example of a situation in which
VA must withhold benefits from a retroactive award
, and
withholding benefits from a retroactive award is not in order
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C - Debt Disputes and Collection
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C
